name: House Guillefer
description: A dreamy noble house of the north-eastern Groaning Loch, ruling from the Hall of Sleep. House Guillefer’s leadership rotates sporadically; under Lord Edwin, the house drifts between aesthetic pursuits and uncanny slumber, leaving parts of its domain neglected—and vulnerable to outside powers.

enclaves.name: The Hall of Sleep
enclaves.role: Dreamy red-wood manor; seat of House Guillefer.

enclaves.name: Blackeswell, Village
enclaves.role: Nigh-forgotten village of once-prosperous traders deep in Mulchgrove; notionally under House Guillefer but long neglected.

enclaves.name: Meagre’s Reach
enclaves.role: Settlement along Lochsbreth Road; ruled by Ygraine the sorceress (and a point of concern for neighbouring nobles).

enclaves.name: Odd
enclaves.role: Outlying settlement in House Guillefer’s domain; under Drune influence/control.

resources.name: Dream-Wards & Household Rites
resources.description: Strange protections and sleep-bound customs tied to the Hall of Sleep.

resources.name: Woodland Guides
resources.description: Woods-wise guides who can trace safe routes along the Lochsbreth Road.

resources.name: Maps, Journals, & Lore
resources.description: Cartographic records, half-finished maps, and travellers’ accounts—often contradictory.

resources.name: Masquerade Contacts
resources.description: Networks of patrons, artists, and minor nobles attracted to House Guillefer’s revels.

resources.name: Ties to Ygraine
resources.description: A delicate personal connection to Ygraine the sorceress, ruler of Meagre’s Reach.

goals.name: Preserve the Hall of Sleep
goals.notes: Maintain the house’s strange rhythms, wards, and ceremonies; keep the Hall secure.

goals.name: Chart the Lochsbreth Road
goals.notes: Pursue Edwin’s obsession with maps and routes through the north-eastern woods.

goals.name: Stabilize the Neglected Domains
goals.notes: Reassert gentle control over Blackeswell and neighbouring holdings without disrupting the house’s slumber.

goals.name: Contain Drune Influence at Odd
goals.notes: Push back Drune control in Odd (1403) and prevent further encroachment.

action_library.name: Hold a Masquerade at the Hall

on_complete.text: Invitations to a midnight masquerade circulate; masked guests whisper of bargains struck in song and shadow.

action_library.name: Commission Cartographers for the Lochsbreth Road

on_complete.text: Fresh maps of the north-eastern woods begin to appear—some accurate, some ominously wrong.
A quiet retinue arrives in Blackeswell, offering coin for order and information.

action_library.name: Treat with Ygraine of Meagre’s Reach

on_complete.text: Messengers travel between the Hall of Sleep and Meagre’s Reach; the woods hum with quiet sorcery.

on_complete.reason: Agents disrupt Drune influence around Odd.

on_complete.text: Nightly fires and sudden sermons unsettle Odd; someone is pushing back against the Drune’s grip.

lord_edwin_guillefer.name: Lord Edwin Guillefer
lord_edwin_guillefer.summary: A slight human man, with lank blond hair,
lord_edwin_guillefer.demeanour: Contemplative, aloof, naive. Kindhearted but absorbed in his artistic pursuits, with little interest in the troubles of the world.
lord_edwin_guillefer.speech: Slow lilting, with frequent contemplative pauses. Favours old-fashioned turns of phrase. Woldish, Old Woldish, Liturgic, surprisingly eloquent Sylvan.
lord_edwin_guillefer.desires: To be left in peace. To visit the fabled fairy courts of the Duke Who Cherishes Dreams (p31), whom he has met in the dreamlands of his deep slumber.
lord_edwin_guillefer.possessions: The Harp of Lady Silver-So-Mirrored—a fairy relic which, when played with skill, conjures low clouds and melancholic drizzle (worth 3,000gp).
lord_edwin_guillefer.family: Eleven sleeping relatives, including his wife and parents.Servants: A small guard (known as sleep-wardens), advisors who deal with the quotidian dealings of the House, groundsmen, cooks, butlers, librarians, etc. Sadewyn Gallbucket (p77), a witch high-priestess, is in the employ of House Guillefer, in the guise of a lady’s maid.

structure.notes: Rulership shifts sporadically among the house nobles; periods of inattention are common.
Quiet servants and guards trained to keep the Hall undisturbed.
Woodsmen hired for travel and mapping along the Lochsbreth Road.

domains.name: Marquisate of Guillefer
domains.notes: Forest on either side of the Lochsbreth Road; includes Blackeswell, Meagre’s Reach, and Odd.

oracle_hooks.rotating_lordship: Use oracle to determine which Guillefer noble is active this turn if Edwin is absent/asleep.
oracle_hooks.dream_omens: Use oracle for the meaning of dreams, portents, and sleep-bound bargains.
